# push

**Instance Method**

Adds a media item to the end of a playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
void push(
    in MediaItem object
);
```

## Parameters

- **object**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/mediaitem] object to be placed at the end of the playlist.

## Modifying the Playlist

- **item**: Returns the media item located in the indicated array index.
- **length**: The number of items in the playlist.
- **Playlist**: Creates a new playlist object.
- **pop**: Removes a media item from the end of a playlist.
- **splice**: Deletes the indicated array elements and replaces them with the specified elements.
